categories: Category:Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order voice actors

nodes.text: Tony Amendola is an American actor who played Eno Cordova in Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order. He is best known for playing the Jaffa master Bra'tac in Stargate SG-1, and for his recurring roles as revolutionary leader Kagame of Liber8 in the television show Continuum and Geppetto on ABC's Once Upon a Time.
